title.value: Методика оценки эффективности инвестирования аграрных субъектов хозяйствования
Methods of efficiency assessment of investment of agrarian managing subjects

journal.title: Problems of Economics : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Tretyakova, I. A., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied the problems of investment of agribusiness entities in the Republic of Belarus.  As a result of realized research it was revealed that the effective realization ensuring of investment potential had to form a basis of the long-term goals caused by the general problems of development and investment ideology of the managing subject. Adoption of the administrative decision on expediency of investments, as a rule, was defined by procedure of determination of their productivity by means of system of the corresponding indicators. The technique of the efficiency express assessment of investment which was approved on the agricultural organizations of the Ministry of Agriculture and Food of the Republic of Belarus in a regional section was presented. It was distinguished by efficiency and availability of information support. In addition, it was found that an effective investment was largely due to the structure of funding sources, influenced on increasing of the effectiveness of the entities' functioning and at the same time determined the state and prospects of development, indicating the priority of profit as an investment resource, which was re-investment potential and caused investment attractiveness.
